name: Ethiopian Chamber of Commerce
description: The Ethiopian Chamber of Commerce and Sectoral Associations (ECCSA) is a non-profit organization that represents the interests of the business community in Ethiopia. It provides a platform for networking, advocacy, and support for businesses across various sectors.
